name: Certainly not a Flappy Bird Clone
name_original: Certainly not a Flappy Bird Clone
description:
Certainly Not a Flappy Bird Clone - CNAFBC

Certainly not a Flappy Bird clone is completely original and unlike any game you've seen or played before.

(not)

In CNAFBC, you seize control of Diego, the cute green bird.

 He flies (jumps, more like) through the landscape and in between the pipes. For if he doesn't, he will explode.

Try and rack up as many points as physically possible before Diego inevitably combusts. There is a high score feature too, so you can keep track of your best score.

CONTROLS:

Jumping: Left mouse button, up arrow, or space bar

Pause: Escape or P
